Share.d: YTDL is tasker+termux project to download YouTube videos on android very easily and seamlessly.

Action.label:
This task to be executed only in case things go out of hand, and you want to stop all ongoing downloads.
It will kill termux app, stop all ongoing ytdl downloads, remove all notifications.

Tasks below will remove tasker notifications that match a regex. Credits to
https://taskernet.com/shares/?user=AS35m8m%2BFga%2BPKETEENtyWu3IGqX35bmTIK3QzSMBeDWmVIVfQqyiHL%2FJjwHE%2FYoZuYG0oNb60waOn0%2Few%3D%3D&id=Task%3ACancel+Notification+By+Title+Match

Action.Str: Getting link info|Download timeout \-|Downloading \-|Download complete \-|Error getting info \(

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: This will kill Termux app, and any other ytdl downloads going on will also be terminated.
Force kill termux and stop downloading

Action.label:
This regex removes the -videoid-extension at end. For example if a line is
Video title blah blah-Pe8K2gjw8s1.mp4 it will match -Pe8K2gjw8s1.mp4

Action.Str: Download mode for individual video downloads?
Note: This download mode for playlist will always be asked regardless of this setting.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
You can re-run this anytime if you want to change setting.
Usage :
Method 1: Share YouTube video, playlist, channel link, or in fact any YouTube link to termux app.
Method 2: Just copy any YouTube link (This will work only on <=android 9 users, or >=android 10 users with tasker having WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission. Launch the "Grant clipboard access" task, to learn how to grant permission)
Individual video download preferences Default resolution: %Prefferedreso_ytdl Download mode: %Mode_ytdl
Playlist download preferences Default resolution: Ask Download mode: Ask
Output Directory : %Download_directory_ytdl

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was retrieved from the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: Set the download folder for ytdl videos.
Press back button when in desired folder to select it.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str: Preferred resolution for individual video downloads.

Select a default resolution: Set a default resolution for individual video downloads. Ask: Ask resolution everytime before downloading.
Note: Resolution settings for playlist will always be asked regardless of this setting.

Action.Str: Android 9 and below don't need to do this step, tasker already has clipboard access.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%td_button Button The label of the button that was clicked</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.Str:
Make sure no ongoing download are running.
This step will delete the following directory: /sdcard/Tasker/ytdl/*
There was an error retrieving video information. Error: Couldn't connect to Internet Link: %returnurl
There was an error retrieving video information. Error: Couldn't connect to Internet Link: %returnurl
You need to complete setup first. Run the ytdl_Intitial_Setup Task
Getting link info, download will start shortly.
